name: StarTech.com 4-Port USB 3.0 SuperSpeed Hub with Power Adapter 5Gbps - Portable Multiport USB-A Dock IT Pro - USB Port Expansion Hub for PC/Mac - 4 Port Powered USB Hub for PC (ST4300USB3)
short_description: Efficient USB Connectivity: Instantly expand your USB capabilities with this 4 port powered USB hub, converting a single USB connection into 4 SuperSpeed USB-A 3.0 ports; connect peripherals like keyboards, mice, and flash drives simultaneously with this versatile USB expansion port

Versatile and Portable Design: This powered USB hub model offers flexibility by functioning with or without an external power adapter; with the adapter, it provides up to 900mA per port, ensuring optimal performance for various devices, enhancing portability and convenience

High-Speed Data Transfer: This powered USB3.0 hub offers exceptional data transfer speeds up to 5Gbps as it is SuperSpeed USB 3.0 compliant; it is also backward compatible with USB 2.0 and 1.0/1.1, providing seamless integration with existing technology, making it an ideal USB dock for IT professionals

Seamless Plug-and-Play Functionality: Designed with convenience in mind, this USB powered hub requires no additional software or drivers; it is compatible with any operating system, including Windows 10, and is tailored for easy integration with laptops as a USB port hub

The IT Pro's Choice: Built for IT professionals, this USB hub is crafted with durability and performance in mind; our product is backed for 2 years, including free lifetime 24/5 multi-lingual technical assistance
product_description: Introducing the StarTech 4-Port USB 3.0 SuperSpeed Hub, a versatile and efficient solution for expanding your USB connectivity. This USB 3.0 hub powered hub allows you to connect multiple USB peripherals such as keyboards, mice, and flash drives simultaneously, enhancing productivity and efficiency. With its compact design, the 4 port super speed hub is perfect for both stationary and on-the-go use. The primary benefit of using the StarTech USB 3.0 4 port hub lies in its ability to deliver rapid data transfer speeds of up to 5Gbps, ensuring that your files are transferred quickly and efficiently. This powered USB3 hub feature saves valuable time and is backward compatible with previous USB versions, making it a versatile addition to your tech arsenal. Solve the common issue of limited USB ports on your laptop or desktop with the StarTech hub. No longer will you need to constantly swap out devices; with the powered USB a hub, you can have them all connected at once. The powered USB3 hub provides up to 900mA of power per port when used with the included external power adapter, ensuring that all your devices receive the necessary power. Unique features of the StarTech 4 port super speed hub include built-in mounting brackets and included DIN mount rails, allowing you to securely install the USB port hub on most surfaces like walls, desks, or racks. This versatility in mounting options sets the USB hub apart from similar items. For optimal use, ensure you follow basic care instructions such as avoiding exposure to extreme temperatures and moisture. The powered USB 3 hub adheres to USB Battery Charging Specification 1.2 and is backed for 2-years with lifetime technical assistance. When purchasing, note that the product does not include additional software or drivers, as the plug-and-play design ensures compatibility across various operating systems.
